div.div: Hormone concentrations in male Astrochelys yniphora populations.
div.p: Mean monthly steroid hormone concentrations in adult male A. yniphora from three sample populations (wild, Madagascar captive, and U.S. captive), sampled from 2013 through 2015. Number of samples collected from each population is listed with the number of individuals represented in parentheticals. Error bars represent 1 SE.
